titles.title: Prisoner of War/Missing in Action National Memorial Act
A bill to designate a Prisoner of War/Missing in Action National Memorial at Riverside National Cemetery in Riverside, California.
Prisoner of War/Missing in Action National Memorial Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Committee on Veterans' Affairs. Hearings held.

bill.summary: Prisoner of War/Missing in Action National Memorial Act - Designates the memorial to former prisoners of war and members of the armed forces missing in action that is under construction at Riverside National Cemetery, California, as the Prisoner of War/Missing in Action National Memorial.
